summary: Tested Media Player new features: disable_swipe (lock navigation), fit_mode (smart/contain/cover), and video autoplay with onLoadedData/onCanPlay handlers. All backend APIs working (13/13 tests passed). Frontend verified: portrait pairing with blur bg in smart mode, object-cover in cover mode, nav arrows hidden when disable_swipe=true.
critical_code_review_comments: MediaPlayer.jsx: buildSlides() correctly pairs consecutive portrait images in smart mode
MediaPlayer.jsx: useImageOrientations() hook detects portrait/landscape by naturalHeight > naturalWidth
MediaPlayer.jsx: handleVideoReady() uses .play() with muted=true for browser autoplay policy compliance
MediaPlayer.jsx: video element has muted, playsInline, onLoadedData, onCanPlay attributes
MediaPlayer.jsx: disableSwipe guards goTo(), onTouchStart, onTouchEnd, and dot clicks
MediaPlayer.jsx: Nav arrows conditionally rendered with !disableSwipe check at line 279
ShowcaseAdminModule.jsx: fit-mode-select dropdown with smart/contain/cover options (line 979-988)
Backend DEFAULT_PLAYER_CONFIG includes disable_swipe=False and fit_mode='smart' defaults
seed_data_creation: Added test items via API: 1 landscape image, 1 video (w3schools), 2 portrait images for pairing test
context_for_next_testing_agent: Media Player new features fully implemented. Admin uses LaoPan OAuth.
